metadata.title: CVE-2025-24162 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue isfixed in visionOS 2.3, Safari 18.3, iOS 18.3 and iPadOS 18.3, macOS Sequoia15.3, watchOS 11.3, tvOS 18.3. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to an unexpected process crash.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
